ADVICE_10_BODYTEXT.message: 'S dòcha gum b' feairrde thu imrich gu buidheann eile nuair a bhios tu ann an staing leis an ùghdarras ionadail.

ADVICE_10_HEADLINE.message: Thoir am fireach ort ri àm

ADVICE_1_BODYTEXT.message: Cuimhnich cò na gnìomhachasan ionadail a tha earbsach nuair a nì thu gnothaichean taobh a-muigh an lagha.

ADVICE_2_BODYTEXT.message: Dh'fhaoidte gun ruig thu an t-amas nas luaithe ma shiubhlas tu iomadh astar beag.

ADVICE_2_HEADLINE.description: (A reference to the famous poem The Road Not Taken, by Robert Frost)

ADVICE_3_BODYTEXT.description: (it simply says, to have enough fuel to leave a place where there is no possibility to refuel)
ADVICE_3_BODYTEXT.message: Na leum gu siostam gun chòmhnadh mur eil dòigh agad gus fhàgail.

ADVICE_3_HEADLINE.message: Na biodh d' earball san deigh: planaig sreath nan leuman agad ro làimh

ADVICE_4_BODYTEXT.message: Tagh am frèam-lorgaidh agad. Gu h-àraidh nuair a bhios tu airson co-fhreagradh ri luaths is comhair amais.

ADVICE_5_BODYTEXT.message: Ceannaich nithean saora is reic gu daor iad.

ADVICE_6_BODYTEXT.message: Thoir an aire air gach naidheachd a chluinneas tu on a bhios buaidh air prìsean a' mhargaidh.

ADVICE_7_BODYTEXT.message: Coisnidh tu deagh chliù le tìodhlacan ach cha chuir gach carthannas ri do chliù.

ADVICE_8_BODYTEXT.message: Nuair a thèid thu gu siostam bìnearaidh, dèan cinnteach gum bi d' amas air an reul cheart.

ADVICE_8_HEADLINE.message: Cum air falbh o dha thrioblaid aig an aon àm

ADVICE_9_BODYTEXT.message: Faigh obair-ghlèidhidh air na h-einnseanan agad ach thoir an aire: gheibh thu seirbheis a-rèir na phàigheas tu.

ADVICE_9_HEADLINE.message: Dèilig gu math ris an t-soitheach agad

TALE_1_BODYTEXT.message: Na caill dubhradh drùidhteach na grèine air Dòchas Ùr fhad 's a bhacas Hades an solar o Epsilon Eridani.

TALE_1_HEADLINE.message: "Chunnaic mi iomadh rud nach creideadh tu"
